title: News reports from France. [No. 72/79] = Chroniques de France
creator_contributor_role: La Societe Nouvelle Pathe-Cinema, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns - France
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Posters - Design and construction
Crafts & Visual Arts/Posters - Design and construction
description: Cinemagazine: 1. Folon - Jean-Michel Folon, black and white and watercolor artist famous for his covers on international magazines and his posters. 2. A day in a schoolteacher's life - Jean-Michel Taillon, a French grade school teacher. 3. Stones - Stones, marvels among minerals, most of the time concealed in the bowels of the earth or beneath the roar of the waves. 4. Jacques Douai - Portrait of French songster Jacques Douai.
